data.name: Amnesia Fortnight
data.detailed_description:
Streaming Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

Amnesia Fortnight is an internal game jam in which the Double Fine development teams drop what they’re doing and work on prototypes for new games. It was originally designed as a break away from traditionally long development cycles to make something different for a while, and in later years provided prototypes for full games such as Costume Quest, Hack 'n' Slash and Stacking.

The Amnesia Fortnight bundle includes the documentary series by 2 Player Productions, filmed alongside the mayhem of the game jam, with an episode for every day. This series documents the fun / stress of making so many games in so little time, but is also an interesting insight into general games development. Each season also includes the prototypes from Amnesia Fortnight. Different games from very different project leads are included, and can be found in the Software section of your Steam Library after purchase.

Additional seasons will be added soon.

2017 Prototypes:

  • Darwin's Dinner
  • The Gods Must Be Hungry
  • I Have No Idea What I'm Doing
  • Kiln

Requirements:

  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 X8 (4,0 GHz)/Intel Core i7-4790 (3,6 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB, AMD Radeon R9 390 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1.5 GB per prototype
  • Internet: Required for Kiln multiplayer connection
  • VR: Required for I Have No Idea What I'm Doing. Headsets: Oculus / Vive, Input: Hand / touch controllers, Play area: Default

data.short_description: It's the Amnesia Fortnight documentary series by 2 Player Productions, filmed alongside the mayhem of the game jam, with an episode for every day. This series documents the fun / stress of making so many games and each season includes the game prototypes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
